content.question: int[] arr = {3, 1, 0, 4, 2};for(int j = 0; j < arr.length; j++){System.out.print(arr[j] + j + " ");}What, if anything, is printed as a result of executing the code segment?

choices.label: Nothing is printed, because an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException is thrown.

skill.text: 3.B: Determine the result or output based on code that contains data abstractions.
